channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I reviewed the MSI Pro MP165 E6 - and this lightweight budget portable monitor is perfect for business travel
item.description: The MSI Pro MP165 E6 is designed for a professional with a lot of different gear, who could benefit from a bit more screen real estate. This could be for a tablet, a gaming console, a computer, a camera, or more, all while staying within a budget.

item.title: Star Wars Outlaws : l’un des plus beaux jeux de la Switch 2 a droit à une belle baisse de 42 % pour Noël
item.description: Embarquez aux côtés de Kay Vess, hors-la-loi de la Bordure extérieure, dans une aventure en monde ouvert qui pousse la Switch 2 dans ses retranchements. Après Cyberpunk 2077, c’est l’un des plus beaux jeux à tourner sur la nouvelle console de Nintendo. Et comme un bon tir de blaster bien placé, son prix s’effondre : 34,99 euros au lieu de 59,99 euros chez la Fnac. ...

item.title: Meze's walnut-cupped wired headphones impress with a bassy sound, but their headband dings my noggin
item.description: The Meze Audio 99 Classics 2nd Gen wired headphones remain homely, walnut-earcupped beauties – but how have they improved from the original?

item.title: Google Assistant : voilà un sursis inattendu qui prouve que Gemini n’est pas prêt
item.description: Google Assistant n'est pas encore mort. Alors que tout indiquait une exécution programmée pour la fin de l'année 2025 au profit de Gemini, Google vient discrètement de mettre à jour son calendrier. Le grand remplacement par l'IA ? Ce ne sera pas pour tout de suite.

item.title: Trump’s Agriculture Bailout Is Alienating His MAHA Base
item.description: The administration’s pro-industry tilt—across three executive agencies—is feeding the MAHA movement’s growing discontent.

item.title: The 23 Best Movies on Amazon Prime, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Wicked, Merry Little Batman, and Die Hard are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: The 48 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery, Frankenstein, and Klaus are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: Rivian’s AI pivot is about more than chasing Tesla
item.description: RJ Scaringe is sitting in Rivian's Palo Alto offices, explaining why the adventure-themed EV company suddenly decided to build its own self-driving cars, when an unexpected guest glides by the window outside: Waymo. A robotaxi from the Alphabet-owned company pulls up outside the office. The passenger, an analyst from Goldman Sachs, briefly takes a selfie […]...

item.title: Is it worth buying Marshall’s soundbar and sub together? I tested them against this pre-packed Samsung combo to find out
item.description: I tested Marshall’s new soundbar and sub together – is it really worth buying them together?

item.title: How to watch 1872 Cup: Live stream Glasgow vs Edinburgh in the United Rugby Championship 2025/26, Game 1 preview
item.description: All the ways to watch the 1872 Cup live streams online from anywhere, as Glasgow take on Edinburgh in the United Rugby Championship 2025/26.

item.title: Thrifting in the age of Ozempic
item.description: The popularity of Ozempic and other GLP-1 weight-loss drugs is prompting many affluent women to clear out their closets—a boon to savvy thrifters. For 10 years, I obsessed over finding a ’70s-era corduroy car coat like the one Wynona Ryder wears in the first season of Stranger Things. Not a “vintage inspired” fashion version, but an American classic turned velvety with wear. That meant thrifting at resale shops. ...

item.title: Hackers Stole Millions of PornHub Users’ Data for Extortion
item.description: Plus: Cisco discloses a zero-day with no available patch, Venezuela accuses the US of a cyberattack, and more.

item.title: 25 Amazon Super Saturday Deals on Last-Minute Gifts We've Tested (2025)
item.description: Procrastinators, rejoice. Super Saturday is here with last-minute deals on WIRED-tested gear.

item.title: Walmart's Black Friday-beating gaming laptop deals feature up to $650 off the latest RTX 5000 series machines
item.description: Walmart's Black Friday-beating gaming laptop deals are still live today - but for how long?

item.title: Size does matter — I think the iPhone 17 has the perfect dimensions
item.description: 6.3 inches is perfect

item.title: Double Cosmic Explosion Gives Birth to Unprecedented ‘Superkilonova’
item.description: In a strange turn of events, a supernova birthed twin baby neutron stars that merged to make a powerful kilonova.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: LG Debuts an RGB LED TV, and Google Brings Find Hub to Wear OS
item.description: Plus: Samsung also announces new Micro RGB TVs, and a looming global memory crunch might make Nvidia reduce its supply of graphics cards.

item.title: 7 Useful Tips for Anyone Connecting to Public Wi-Fi
item.description: Our public spaces are now awash with wireless internet. Make sure you’re getting the most out of every connection.

item.title: The sold-out Nex Playground made my kids laugh and cry
item.description: If you told me last year the Nex Playground would outsell Microsoft's Xbox, even for two weeks, I would have laughed my way out of the room. It's a three-inch cube of a game console that's likely less powerful than your phone, one which uses a single camera to track your body. It only plays […]

item.title: Five post-incident improvements that actually strengthen resilience
item.description: When a major incident hits, the focus naturally turns to restoration. Yet the real test comes afterwards. What can be learned from past failings?

item.title: I'm a recording musician, and the Beyerdynamic DT990 Pro headphones are the audio Christmas gift I've bought for myself
item.description: Beyerdynamic's DT990 Pro are great studio headphones with exceptional comfort and an open-back design

item.title: 5 top CMOs dish on 2025, how they’re preparing for 2026
item.description: Hear directly from the world class CMOs at McDonald’s, State Farm, Kraft Heinz, Hinge, and Crayola on how they survived ’25 and will click in ’26. Never before has the CMO position been more complex—or more essential to driving business results. The mark of success for any chief marketing officer is their impact on the long-term trajectory of a beloved brand. ...

item.title: New Year’s resolutions don’t work: Try this bingo card instead
item.description: Rather than setting yourself up to fail with yet another audacious goal you’ll have bailed on by February, have a go at these strategies. There’s something incredibly compelling about a brand-new year. A fresh start beckons, with each day untroubled by your past decisions. Whatever mistakes you made in 2025 are old news. They were sooo last year. You’re a new person now with new priorities, new habits, and new strategies. It’s in this spirit of new-leaf-turning-over that nearly a third of American adults—and almost half of 18- to 29-year-olds—decide to make New Year’s resolutions for the comin...

item.title: This $27 homebuilder says the Feds are cooking up something big to ‘address’ housing market affordability
item.description: Lennar co-CEO Stuart Miller says major homebuilders are in discussions with the Trump administration: ‘Do I think that something will come out in 2026? I’d be surprised if something isn’t done.’ Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Hausse des prix, délais rallongés et pénurie : tout ce qu’il faut comprendre de la crise de la RAM
item.description: Vous entendez partout sans peut-être réellement comprendre les enjeux. La mémoire RAM s'arrache à prix d'or en ce moment et certains acteurs délaissent même le marché grand public. Une situation qui concerne en premier lieu les PC, mais pourrait par capillarité atteindre tous les produits tech. On vous explique tout ce que vous devez savoir à propos de la crise de la RAM. ...
